Title: Hoozuki no Reitetsu 2nd Season OVA
Description: ['Bundled with the limited editions of 29th, 30th, and 31st volumes of the ', Hoozuki no Reitetsu, ' manga.', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' ', OVA 3 will be streamed in advance on September 1, 2020. OVA 3 will officially be released with volume 31 of the manga on September 23 2020.]
